title: Agribusiness as a sustainable tool to mitigate rural-urban migration of youth in Kenya

tasks.task: Addressing migration and promoting agribusiness in rural Kenya
subtasks: Extending awareness about the benefits of agriculture for youth
Training youth in agribusiness skills and entrepreneurship
Supporting rural youth in establishing agribusiness projects
Changing mindset around agriculture as a viable career choice
Highlighting the role of technology and value addition in agriculture
Facilitating market access and financial support for agribusinesses
Encouraging pride and engagement in agricultural careers
Promoting local value chains to reduce rural-urban migration
Motivating educated youth to return to rural areas
Preparing youth for the growing food demand in the future
Collaborating with local governments and organizations

tasks.task: Addressing rural-urban migration in Kenya by promoting agribusiness for youth**
